pages.text: An example of how the ritual can be placed.

From your studies, you figured out a way to make rituals that surrounds summoning and controlling creatures. The rails and ladders are to signify motion, and the pumpkin signifies life, for a Carved Pumpkin is what gives life to Snow and Iron. Funnily, through your researches, you've found out that aside from giving life, pumpkins also have a magical property that stops Enderman from being enraged if you stare at them while wearing it, and not because you are fooling them.
